class-rigger:jury-rig

Full name:

maven-class-rigger-plugin:maven-class-rigger-plugin:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT:jury-rig

Description:

Goal which allows one to match the compiled java classfiles with bcel.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: compile.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
classDirectory File - Location of the class files to match.
riggerML File - Location of the RiggerML file.

Parameter Details

classDirectory:

Location of the class files to match.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}/classes

riggerML:

Location of the RiggerML file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.basedir}/src/main/rigger/config.xml
